nav.div: Renaissance Academy Charter School » For Parents » Coronavirus (COVID-19) RA Information & Resources

p.strong: In compliance with the most recent announcements from the Governor's office Renaissance Academy will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
Below is information and resources to help during the closure of RA.

ul.li: Extended Closure Family Counseling & Support Page - Local community and online resources you may find helpful during the school closure.

span.a: Getting Tech Help During COVID-19 Closure

div.p: The Renaissance Academy is committed to ensuring that all information placed on its website is accessible to individuals with disabilities. If you have a disability and the format of any material on our website interferes with your ability to access the information, please Visit our Accessibility Page for assistance.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
